'''Sabaton''' is a Swedish heavy metal band. Their song "Shadows" is based on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien's]] writings.



==Shadows==
"Shadows" is the fourth track on Sabaton's 2007 [[Metalizer]] album. It is about the [[Nazgûl]], the corrupted servants of [[Sauron]].  

===Lyrics excerpt===
<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">Facing the wind as they ride through the sky
Shadows of Mordor, black horses they fly
Black shadow king, find the ring
Search for the Halfling, you lords of the dark
The hobbit with Sauron's ring, he is your mark
Unholy light, in the night <ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://www.sabaton.net/discography/metalizer/shadows/|dated=2007|accessed=31 August 2025|website=[https://www.sabaton.net/ Sabaton]}}</ref>
</poem>
